title: Test of a Single Variance
text: The observer's claim is that the standard deviation is greater than $$0.81$$, which will be the alternate claim.
speech: The observer's claim is that the standard deviation is greater than  0.81 , which will be the alternate claim.

, which will be the alternate claim.

title: Test of a Single Variance
text: The prevailing belief is that the standard deviations are $$0.81$$, and the person conducting the test will test against that null claim.
speech: The prevailing belief is that the standard deviations are  0.81 , and the person conducting the test will test against that null claim.
pacedSpeech: The prevailing belief is that the standard deviations are   0.81
, and the person conducting the test will test against that null claim.

title: Test of a Single Variance
text: Even though we are given the population standard deviation the test using populaton variance can still follow $$H_0$$: q**2=0.81**2,H_a:q**2>0.81**2
